10 #include "ssmt/HeatLoss.h"

12 HeatLoss::HeatLoss(const double inletPressure, const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity quantityType,
13  const double quantityValue, const double inletMassFlow, const double percentHeatLoss)
14  : inletPressure(inletPressure), quantityValue(quantityValue), inletMassFlow(inletMassFlow),
15  percentHeatLoss(percentHeatLoss / 100), quantityType(quantityType)
16 {
17  calculateProperties();
18 }
19 
20 void HeatLoss::calculateProperties() {
21  auto sp = SteamProperties(inletPressure, quantityType, quantityValue).calculate();
22  inletEnergyFlow = sp.specificEnthalpy * inletMassFlow;
23  outletEnergyFlow = inletEnergyFlow * (1 - percentHeatLoss);
24 
25  inletProperties = {inletMassFlow, inletEnergyFlow, sp};
26 
27  const double qtyValueCalc = (inletMassFlow == 0.0) ? sp.specificEnthalpy : outletEnergyFlow / inletMassFlow;
28  sp = SteamProperties(inletPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTHALPY, qtyValueCalc).calculate();
29 
30  outletProperties = {inletMassFlow, outletEnergyFlow, sp};
31 
32  heatLoss = inletEnergyFlow - outletEnergyFlow;
33 }
34 
35 void HeatLoss::setInletPressure(double inletPressure) {
36  this->inletPressure = inletPressure;
37  calculateProperties();
38 }
39 
40 void HeatLoss::setQuantityValue(double quantityValue) {
41  this->quantityValue = quantityValue;
42  calculateProperties();
43 }

46  this->inletMassFlow = inletMassFlow;
47  calculateProperties();
48 }
49 
50 void HeatLoss::setPercentHeatLoss(double percentHeatLoss) {
51  this->percentHeatLoss = percentHeatLoss;
52  calculateProperties();
53 }

56  this->quantityType = quantityType;
57  calculateProperties();
58 }
